items.sentence: Would you like to have lunch together sometime?
I\'m not surprised Tom wasn\'t able to do that.
The news that Tom had died surprised everybody.
Are there any good restaurants near your house?
Are you convinced Tom was the one who did that?
There\'s still a chance that Tom might help us.
Why don\'t you ask Tom what he thinks happened?
Why don\'t you come over after work for dinner?
You\'ve been in contact with Tom, haven\'t you?
You\'ve come back to be with Tom, haven\'t you?
